name: Hexa Puzzle Saga
description:
Help your kingdom survive crises, and grow your wealth through managing your ruler's powers and solving hex puzzles.

-- Daily leaderboards showcase the best rulers
-- Hexagon puzzles to exercise a ruler's mind
-- Epic power-ups to lift your kingdom to new heights

Each Block Hexa puzzle has multiple solutions and an optimum way to earn the most points. The best hex puzzlers will find ways to combine cities and natural resources for huge multipliers. If you rotate the hex pieces, you'll find new ways to combine pieces on even the simplest hex puzzle to earn piles of gold.

From Jeff: I hope you have fun and challenge your mind with this little hexa puzzle game I made. I'm pretty happy with it, and I can't wait to see you all on the leaderboards!
